description: ID for the Student Matriculation Data Load

Student_Matriculation_Data.description: The ID of the Academic Record that is created. Must be unique, will be automatically assigned if not provided.

Student_ApplicationObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_ApplicationObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

The selected Student cannot be a duplicate

description: Web Service element for Student Matriculation Data

validation.validation: The Student Application has already been Matriculated.
Provide either a Student Application or Pre-Matriculation Data.
Academic Records must be for the same Student.
Academic Records must have matching Unit Types.
An existing academic record cannot be updated.
The selected Student is a duplicate of an existing student.
You can only matriculate applications that have an Admit decision rendered on them.
You cannot matriculate a Student Application with an outstanding Matriculation process delay.
